talkNodes.parameters: I can't tell: our sensors are on the fritz.
It's not just the sensors, either.
We are officially out of EVERYTHING,
and that includes oxygen, by the way.
We need refueling, and we need it now.
I repeat: are you the Empire resupply ship?
Where have you guys BEEN all this time?
Have you brought the radioactives we need?.

talkNodes.name: Radioactives.Yes
talkNodes.parameters: Excellent.  Good doing business with you..

talkNodes.name: Radioactives.No
talkNodes.parameters: Please hurry, we desperately need them.
